experiences: Worked as a Field Engineer and Caretaker Leader at PT Abacus Teknika Solusindo (a subsidiary of BCA) from 2019 to 2024, where I led technician teams, coordinated preventive and corrective maintenance across multiple cities, maintained high machine uptime, and ensured technical reporting and compliance with safety standards.
Maintenance, repair, and installation of electronics panels, including PLC, HMI, and SCADA systems. Build some projects using Python/C++ code basic for Arduino/Rapberry Pi.
